text:
At IHS Markit, as a Software Engineer, I developed, designed, and delivered enterprise-grade geospatial analytics platforms and decision support tools used by over 20 automotive clients across 7 continents. My key accomplishments included:

 Developing full-stack spatial intelligence platforms using C, ASP.NET, VB.NET, and jQuery, integrating over 1 million geolocation records for real-time analysis.
 Building interactive map overlays driven by live data from SQL Server, which enabled dynamic dealer network analysis and territory forecasting tools.
 Delivering geospatial modules for regional planning, forecasting, and market visibility, which boosted dealer network transparency by 100%.
 Owning the complete end-to-end delivery cycle—from backend data modeling to frontend UI—ensuring data integrity, secure deployments, and continuous system enhancements.
